column1: learned counsel for the accused-appellants further requests that the Court can impose a lessor
custodial sentence for all counts based on statutory rape on the following grounds that make
this case a fit and appropriate, to do so;

column2: That the accused-appellants had no previous convictions.
The 01st accused was 24 years of age by the time of this unfortunate incident and
he is a married person with 2 children.
The 02nd accused was 36 years of age by the time of this unfortunate incident and
he is a married person with 3 children.
That  it  was  with  the  consent  of  the  victim  that  both  of  them  had  engaged  in
sexual activities and not by force.
There is no evidence that the accused-appellants acted violently or used force to
No bodily injuries were present on the Victim.
